_header: So that mankind through none man no might be redressed
Subjects: redemption; Christ, gifts of; Christ, love of
_description: Two couplets, separated by English prose, in a Latin prose text

WorcF126.Transcription:
So þat monkunde þourȝ non mon no miȝth be
                    redressidne deliuered of þys schome bot þourȝ ihesu crist y
                    blessidþat com in þe lordes nomeIn wuche wordes ich y
                    sea worschippynge & a tokene of loue& a knoulechinge & a
                    stat a boue
